<!-- commit: e57f4d3601ed606a4560141fe04e5971a69b0beb -->
<!-- generated_at: 2025-11-14T02:39:36Z -->
# Platform: Flutter

## notifly_flutter_android/android/src/main/kotlin/tech/notifly/flutter
- [Notiflyflutterplugin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_android/android/src/main/kotlin/tech/notifly/flutter/NotiflyFlutterPlugin.kt): Android Flutter plugin exposing MethodChannel 'notifly_flutter_android' to bridge Flutter calls (initialize, setUserId/setEmail/setPhoneNumber/setTimezone/setUserProperties, trackEvent, getNotiflyUserId, setLogLevel, addNotificationClickListener) to Notifly SDK, handling threading via coroutines and dispatching native notification click events.
- [Version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_android/android/src/main/kotlin/tech/notifly/flutter/version.kt): Declares the Android plugin version constant NOTIFLY_FLUTTER_PLUGIN_VERSION ("2.0.
- [Notiflyserializer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_android/android/src/main/kotlin/tech/notifly/flutter/NotiflySerializer.kt): NotiflySerializer statically converts IPushNotification and INotificationClickEvent into HashMap<String, Any> for Flutter interop, mapping fields (title, body, ids, customData, rawPayload, url, imageUrl) and using importance.ordinal.
- [Notiflyflutterplugin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_android/android/src/main/kotlin/tech/notifly/flutter/NotiflyFlutterPlugin.kt): Flutter plugin bridging MethodChannel 'notifly_flutter_android' to the Notifly Android SDK, exposing initialization, user/profile APIs, event tracking, async getNotiflyUserId, log-level and notification-click listener (forwards events to Flutter).
- [Version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_android/android/src/main/kotlin/tech/notifly/flutter/version.kt): Defines the Android plugin version constant NOTIFLY_FLUTTER_PLUGIN_VERSION = "2.0.
- [Notiflyserializer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_android/android/src/main/kotlin/tech/notifly/flutter/NotiflySerializer.kt): Converts IPushNotification and INotificationClickEvent into HashMap<String, Any> for Flutter interop—exposes serializeNotification and serializeNotificationClickEvent, omits null fields and encodes importance as enum ordinal.

## notifly_flutter_android/lib
- [Notifly Flutter Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_android/lib/notifly_flutter_android.dart): Android Notifly platform implementation using MethodChannel 'notifly_flutter_android' to forward initialize, user/profile setters, event tracking and queries to native Android, throwing PlatformException on failure; registerWith entry.
- [Notifly Flutter Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_android/lib/notifly_flutter_android.dart): Android class extends NotiflyFlutterPlatform using MethodChannel 'notifly_flutter_android' to invoke native methods (initialize, setLogLevel/userId/properties/email/phone/timezone, trackEvent, getNotiflyUserId/getPlatformName), throws PlatformException on failure; registerWith() sets instance.

## notifly_flutter_android/test
- [Notifly Flutter Android Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_android/test/notifly_flutter_android_test.dart): Unit tests for NotiflyFlutterAndroid that mock MethodChannel via TestDefaultBinaryMessengerBinding to verify registerWith() sets NotiflyFlutterPlatform.instance and getPlatformName() returns mocked 'Android'.
- [Notifly Flutter Android Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_android/test/notifly_flutter_android_test.dart): Unit tests for NotiflyFlutterAndroid that mock its MethodChannel via TestDefaultBinaryMessengerBinding to verify registerWith registration and getPlatformName method-call behavior, depending on platform_interface.

## notifly_flutter_ios/ios/Classes
- [Notiflyflutterplugin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_ios/ios/Classes/NotiflyFlutterPlugin.swift): Registers FlutterMethodChannel "notifly_flutter_ios" and handles calls (initialize, setUserId/setUserProperties/setEmail/setPhoneNumber/setTimezone, trackEvent, getNotiflyUserId) by invoking notifly_sdk, parsing JSON and logging.
- [Version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_ios/ios/Classes/version.swift): Defines a Foundation-backed Constants struct exposing the SDK_VERSION static string ("2.0.
- [Notiflyflutterplugin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_ios/ios/Classes/NotiflyFlutterPlugin.swift): Flutter iOS plugin bridging the "notifly_flutter_ios" method channel to notifly_sdk; handles initialize (sets SDK type/version), user id/properties, email/phone/timezone, trackEvent (JSON parsing), and logging.
- [Version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_ios/ios/Classes/version.swift): Defines a simple Constants struct exposing SDK_VERSION ("2.0.

## notifly_flutter_ios/lib
- [Notifly Flutter Ios](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_ios/lib/notifly_flutter_ios.dart): iOS NotiflyFlutterPlatform implementation using MethodChannel 'notifly_flutter_ios' to invoke native methods (initialize, setUserId/email/phone/timezone, setUserProperties, trackEvent, getNotiflyUserId), JSON-encodes maps; registerWith() sets instance.
- [Notifly Flutter Ios](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_ios/lib/notifly_flutter_ios.dart): iOS implementation of NotiflyFlutterPlatform using MethodChannel 'notifly_flutter_ios' to forward initialize, setUserId/email/phone/timezone, JSON-encode userProperties/events for trackEvent, and registerWith().

## notifly_flutter_ios/test
- [Notifly Flutter Ios Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_ios/test/notifly_flutter_ios_test.dart): Unit tests for NotiflyFlutterIOS that mock its MethodChannel via TestDefaultBinaryMessengerBinding to verify registerWith() sets NotiflyFlutterPlatform.instance and getPlatformName() call/response logging.
- [Notifly Flutter Ios Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_ios/test/notifly_flutter_ios_test.dart): Unit tests for NotiflyFlutterIOS that mock MethodChannel via TestDefaultBinaryMessengerBinding, verifying registerWith registers the platform instance and getPlatformName sends 'getPlatformName' and returns 'iOS'.

## notifly_flutter_platform_interface/lib
- [Notifly Flutter Platform Interface](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_platform_interface/lib/notifly_flutter_platform_interface.dart): Abstract platform interface exposing a MethodChannel and defining NotiflyFlutterPlatform APIs (initialize, setUserId/props/email/phone/timezone, trackEvent, getNotiflyUserId, requestPermission), defaulting to MethodChannelNotiflyFlutter and enforcing PlatformInterface.verify.
- [Notifly Flutter Platform Interface](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_platform_interface/lib/notifly_flutter_platform_interface.dart): Defines the NotiflyFlutterPlatform abstract PlatformInterface (defaulting to MethodChannelNotiflyFlutter), exposing a late MethodChannel and async APIs (initialize, setUserId/setUserProperties, trackEvent, getNotiflyUserId, requestPermission) with instance verification.

## notifly_flutter_platform_interface/lib/src
- [Method Channel Notifly Flutter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_platform_interface/lib/src/method_channel_notifly_flutter.dart): MethodChannelNotiflyFlutter implements NotiflyFlutterPlatform using a 'notifly_flutter' MethodChannel to forward initialize, user/profile setters, trackEvent, permission and query calls to native code via invokeMethod.
- [Method Channel Notifly Flutter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_platform_interface/lib/src/method_channel_notifly_flutter.dart): MethodChannelNotiflyFlutter implements NotiflyFlutterPlatform using a MethodChannel('notifly_flutter') to invoke native methods (initialize, setLogLevel/userId/properties/email/phone/timezone, trackEvent, getPlatformName/getNotiflyUserId, requestPermission).

## notifly_flutter_platform_interface/test
- [Notifly Flutter Platform Interface Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_platform_interface/test/notifly_flutter_platform_interface_test.dart): Unit test that injects NotiflyFlutterMock into NotiflyFlutterPlatform.instance (singleton), ensures TestWidgetsFlutterBinding init, and verifies getPlatformName() returns the mock "Mock" string.
- [Notifly Flutter Platform Interface Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_platform_interface/test/notifly_flutter_platform_interface_test.dart): Unit test that mocks NotiflyFlutterPlatform by overriding getPlatformName, sets NotiflyFlutterPlatform.instance, and verifies getPlatformName returns the mock constant, using TestWidgetsFlutterBinding.

## notifly_flutter_platform_interface/test/src
- [Method Channel Notifly Flutter Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_platform_interface/test/src/method_channel_notifly_flutter_test.dart): Unit test for MethodChannelNotiflyFlutter verifying getPlatformName via a mocked MethodChannel handler (TestDefaultBinaryMessengerBinding), logging MethodCall arguments and asserting returned platformName.
- [Method Channel Notifly Flutter Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_platform_interface/test/src/method_channel_notifly_flutter_test.dart): Unit tests MethodChannelNotiflyFlutter.getPlatformName by mocking the DefaultBinaryMessenger method channel via setMockMethodCallHandler, logging MethodCall entries and returning a fixture 'platformName' to assert call/response.

## notifly_flutter_web/lib
- [Notifly Flutter Web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_web/lib/notifly_flutter_web.dart): Web NotiflyFlutterPlatform implementation that appends the Notifly JS SDK to document.head, initializes it (projectId/username/password), and proxies requestPermission/setUser*/setTimezone/trackEvent via dart:js callbacks.
- [Constants](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_web/lib/constants.dart): Defines Config exposing static constants (SDK_TYPE 'js-flutter', SDK_VERSION '2.0.
- [Notifly Flutter Web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_web/lib/notifly_flutter_web.dart): Web implementation of NotiflyFlutterPlatform that injects the Notifly JS SDK, exposes initialize/requestPermission/setUserId/setUserProperties/setEmail/setPhoneNumber/setTimezone/trackEvent via JS interop using Completer-based futures (registerWith).
- [Constants](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter_web/lib/constants.dart): Defines Config with static constants SDK_TYPE ('js-flutter'), SDK_VERSION ('2.0.

## notifly_flutter/example/android/app/src/main/kotlin/com/example/notifly_flutter/example
- [Mainactivity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/android/app/src/main/kotlin/com/example/notifly_flutter/example/MainActivity.kt): MainActivity.kt defines the Android app entrypoint class MainActivity extending io.
- [Mainactivity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/android/app/src/main/kotlin/com/example/notifly_flutter/example/MainActivity.kt): Example Android entry point that subclasses io.flutter.

## notifly_flutter/example/android/app/src/main/kotlin/package_name/example
- [Mainactivity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/android/app/src/main/kotlin/package_name/example/MainActivity.kt): MainActivity.kt defines the Android entrypoint MainActivity subclassing io.
- [Mainactivity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/android/app/src/main/kotlin/package_name/example/MainActivity.kt): Android example MainActivity subclassing FlutterActivity to host the Flutter UI; no overrides—uses default Flutter embedding and lifecycle behavior as the example app's Android entry point.

## notifly_flutter/example/integration_test
- [App Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/integration_test/app_test.dart): Integration E2E test that ensures the IntegrationTest binding, boots the example app (app.main()), taps "Get Platform Name", and asserts displayed platform text via dart:io expectedPlatformName().
- [App Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/integration_test/app_test.dart): Integration test using IntegrationTestWidgetsFlutterBinding that launches app.main, taps "Get Platform Name", and verifies "Platform Name: <Android|iOS>" visibility (uses dart:io Platform; throws UnsupportedError otherwise).

## notifly_flutter/example/ios/NotiflyNotificationExtension
- [Notificationservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/ios/NotiflyNotificationExtension/NotificationService.swift): iOS Notification Service Extension subclass that initializes NotiflyNotificationServiceExtension and calls setup() to register(projectId: "b80c3f0e2fbd5eb986df4f1d32ea2871", username: "minyong") via notifly_sdk_push_extension.
- [Notificationservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/ios/NotiflyNotificationExtension/NotificationService.swift): Notification service extension subclass that initializes notifly_sdk_push_extension and invokes register(projectId: String, username: String) in setup to bind the extension to a project/user on startup.

## notifly_flutter/example/ios/Runner
- [Appdelegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/ios/Runner/AppDelegate.swift): iOS AppDelegate integrating notifly_sdk with Flutter: registers GeneratedPluginRegistrant, sets UNUserNotificationCenter.delegate, and forwards push/notification lifecycle callbacks (didRegister/didFail/didReceive/willPresent) to Notifly APIs.
- [Appdelegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/ios/Runner/AppDelegate.swift): iOS AppDelegate bridging Flutter and notifly_sdk: registers plugins, sets UNUserNotificationCenter.delegate, and forwards push lifecycle callbacks (device token, registration failure, willPresent, didReceive) to Notifly.

## notifly_flutter/example/ios/RunnerTests
- [Runnertests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/ios/RunnerTests/RunnerTests.swift): iOS XCTest stub for the example Runner target importing Flutter/UIKit/XCTest; provides an empty XCTestCase (RunnerTests) with a placeholder testExample() method for adding app unit tests.
- [Runnertests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/ios/RunnerTests/RunnerTests.swift): Placeholder XCTestCase for the iOS Runner containing an empty testExample() method; imports Flutter, UIKit, XCTest and serves as the entry point for adding app-level unit tests for the Flutter Runner.

## notifly_flutter/example/lib
- [Firebase Options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/lib/firebase_options.dart): Generated FlutterFire file providing FirebaseOptions constants (android, ios) and a DefaultFirebaseOptions.currentPlatform getter that selects platform-specific options (uses firebase_core, defaultTargetPlatform, kIsWeb) and throws UnsupportedError for unsupported platforms.
- [Main](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/lib/main.dart): Example app entrypoint initializing dotenv, Firebase/FCM, NotiflyPlugin, uni_links deeplinks and GoRouter routing, registering background/foreground FCM handlers and Android-specific notification click/log listeners.
- [Firebase Options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/lib/firebase_options.dart): Generated FlutterFire config exposing DefaultFirebaseOptions.android/ios and a platform-aware DefaultFirebaseOptions.
- [Main](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/lib/main.dart): Example app bootstrap initializing Firebase/FirebaseMessaging and NotiflyPlugin (main(), initializeApp(), setupInteractedMessage(), _firebaseMessagingBackgroundHandler), handles Android logging, permissions, notification clicks, and uni_links deep-links routing via GoRouter.

## notifly_flutter/example/lib/src
- [Homepage](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/lib/src/HomePage.dart): HomePage UI that uses NotiflyPlugin to set user identifiers/properties, track events with typed params and optional segmentation keys, requests permissions, navigates via GoRouter, and shows SnackBars.
- [Detailpage](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/lib/src/DetailPage.dart): Stateless DetailPage widget (required String id) renders a Scaffold showing the route id and an ElevatedButton that calls GoRouter.of(context).
- [Homepage](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/lib/src/HomePage.dart): Stateful Flutter example page providing UI to call NotiflyPlugin APIs (getNotiflyUserId, requestPermission, setUserId/email/phone/timezone/userProperties, trackEvent) with dynamic event params, value casting, SnackBar feedback, and GoRouter navigation.
- [Detailpage](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/lib/src/DetailPage.dart): DetailPage is a StatelessWidget that displays the provided route id and exposes a button that calls GoRouter.of(context).

## notifly_flutter/example/macos/Runner
- [Mainflutterwindow](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/macos/Runner/MainFlutterWindow.swift): MainFlutterWindow.swift defines an NSWindow subclass that overrides awakeFromNib to instantiate a FlutterViewController, set it as contentViewController, preserve frame, and call RegisterGeneratedPlugins for plugin registration.
- [Appdelegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/macos/Runner/AppDelegate.swift): macOS Flutter app delegate subclassing FlutterAppDelegate (NSApplicationMain) that imports Cocoa/FlutterMacOS and overrides applicationShouldTerminateAfterLastWindowClosed(_:)->Bool to force quit app when last window closes.
- [Mainflutterwindow](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/macos/Runner/MainFlutterWindow.swift): MainFlutterWindow.swift overrides awakeFromNib to instantiate a FlutterViewController, set it as the window's contentViewController, preserve the frame, and call RegisterGeneratedPlugins (Cocoa/FlutterMacOS).
- [Appdelegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/macos/Runner/AppDelegate.swift): macOS AppDelegate subclassing FlutterAppDelegate (NSApplicationMain) that imports Cocoa/FlutterMacOS and forces app termination when the last window closes by overriding applicationShouldTerminateAfterLastWindowClosed(_:).

## notifly_flutter/example/macos/RunnerTests
- [Runnertests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/macos/RunnerTests/RunnerTests.swift): XCTestCase placeholder for the macOS Flutter example Runner: imports FlutterMacOS/Cocoa, provides an empty testExample() entry point for adding app tests (no current assertions or side effects).
- [Runnertests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/macos/RunnerTests/RunnerTests.swift): macOS XCTestCase stub for the Runner app providing a placeholder testExample, imports FlutterMacOS Cocoa XCTest, and serves as the entry point for adding app-specific unit tests.

## notifly_flutter/example/test
- [Widget Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/test/widget_test.dart): Widget test that calls pumpWidget(MyApp), taps the '+' Icon with WidgetTester, and asserts the counter increments from '0' to '1' using flutter_test.
- [Widget Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/test/widget_test.dart): Widget test that pumps the example app (MyApp) using flutter_test, asserts initial counter text '0', taps Icons.add via WidgetTester, pumps a frame, and verifies counter increments to '1'.

## notifly_flutter/example/test_driver
- [Integration Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/test_driver/integration_test.dart): Integration test entrypoint that calls integration_test.integrationDriver(), initializing the integration_test VM-driver and test harness to run and report example app integration tests.
- [Integration Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/example/test_driver/integration_test.dart): Entrypoint that invokes integration_test's integrationDriver() to run instrumentation tests, collect results, and bridge communication with the Flutter test harness (imports package:integration_test).

## notifly_flutter/lib
- [Notifly Flutter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/lib/notifly_flutter.dart): Provides NotiflyPlugin facade over NotiflyFlutterPlatform (platform channel), exposing initialization, permission, user/profile and event APIs, getNotiflyUserId, Android notification-click listeners, and Android method-call handling/logging.
- [Notifly Flutter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/lib/notifly_flutter.dart): NotiflyPlugin exposes initialize(), requestPermission(), setLogLevel(), user setters, trackEvent(), getNotiflyUserId(), and Android-only addNotificationClickListener (onNotificationClick handling) via NotiflyFlutterPlatform/MethodChannel.

## notifly_flutter/lib/src
- [Utils](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/lib/src/utils.dart): Defines abstract JSONStringRepresentable with jsonRepresentation() and convertToJsonString(Map?) that pretty-prints JSON using dart:convert's JsonEncoder.
- [Notification](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/lib/src/notification.dart): Parses Notifly JSON notification payloads into OSNotification/OSNotificationClickEvent models (with NotificationClickListener typedef), decoding rawPayload via JsonDecoder and serializing via JSONStringRepresentable/convertToJsonString.
- [Utils](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/lib/src/utils.dart): Defines abstract JSONStringRepresentable with jsonRepresentation() and a convertToJsonString(Map<String,dynamic>?) helper that pretty-prints via JsonEncoder.
- [Notification](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/lib/src/notification.dart): Defines OSNotification and OSNotificationClickEvent models (Map constructors parsing rawPayload), OSNotificationImportance enum, NotificationClickListener typedef, and jsonRepresentation using utils.convertToJsonString.

## notifly_flutter/test
- [Notifly Flutter Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/test/notifly_flutter_test.dart): Unit tests for NotiflyFlutter.getPlatformName: injects MockNotiflyFlutterPlatform as NotiflyFlutterPlatform.
- [Notifly Flutter Test](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly_flutter/main/notifly_flutter/test/notifly_flutter_test.dart): Unit tests for getPlatformName that set NotiflyFlutterPlatform.instance to a MockNotiflyFlutterPlatform (mocktail/MockPlatformInterfaceMixin), verifying successful name return and null-triggered exception.
